was voted comeback player of the year. DALLAS- The NFL threw Michael Vick a party Saturday night as the Eagles quarterback was named comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. I thank my coaches and my teammates, said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award. ''They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents.''
